sections.title: Duelist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Duelist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Duelist)
sections.description: Duelists are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, light armor, but not shields.

sections.title: Canny Defense (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Adds Intelligence bonus per duelist level as a dodge bonus to AC when wearing light/no armor, not using a shield, and wielding a melee weapon.

sections.title: Precise Strike (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Adds duelist level to damage when using light or one-handed piercing weapons, but cannot attack with off-hand or use a shield.

sections.title: Improved Reaction (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains +2 bonus to initiative at 2nd level, increasing to +4 at 8th level, stacking with Improved Initiative feat.

sections.title: Parry (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Can forgo an attack during full attack to parry attacks against self or adjacent allies as an immediate action by making an opposed attack roll.

sections.title: Enhanced Mobility (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains additional +4 AC bonus against attacks of opportunity when moving out of threatened squares while wearing light/no armor and not using a shield.

sections.title: Combat Reflexes (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains the Combat Reflexes feat benefit when using light or one-handed piercing weapons.

sections.title: Grace (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains +2 competence bonus on Reflex saves when wearing light/no armor and not using a shield.

sections.title: Riposte (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Can make an attack of opportunity against any creature whose attack was successfully parried, if within reach.

sections.title: Acrobatic Charge (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Can charge over difficult terrain that normally slows movement, though appropriate checks may still be required.

sections.title: Elaborate Defense (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains additional +1 dodge bonus to AC per 3 duelist levels when fighting defensively or using total defense in melee.

sections.title: Deflect Arrows (Duelist)
sections.description: Gains Deflect Arrows feat benefit when using light or one-handed piercing weapons without needing a free hand.

sections.title: No Retreat (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: Adjacent enemies that take a withdraw action provoke an attack of opportunity from the duelist.

sections.title: Crippling Critical (Ex) (Duelist)
sections.description: On confirmed critical hits with light or one-handed piercing weapons, can apply additional penalties like speed reduction, ability damage, or bleed.
